entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.2.0
entry.content:
ğŸš€ New Features

  • New Animations â€“ Tooltips now include smooth docking transitions. Checklists come with a completion animation and will automatically expand when users complete an item, creating a more dynamic experience.

  • Flow + Checklist = Infinite Logic â€“ Weâ€™ve enhanced how flows and checklists can work together. You can now build complex, multi-branch onboarding logic using a mix of flows and checklists â€” flexible enough to cover almost any use case.

  • Push-based Updates â€“ Usertour.js no longer relies on polling to fetch content. Instead, we now use Socket.IO to push real-time updates to users â€” including modals, surveys, and checklists. Itâ€™s faster, lighter, and smarter.

  • ğŸ” Start From a Specific Step â€“ When triggering a flow from inside another flow or checklist, you can now choose which step to start from â€” not just the first step. This gives you more flexibility in designing contextual onboarding.

ğŸ¨ UX & Interaction Improvements

  • Improved all loading and debounce logic across the app for smoother data handling.
  • Reworked several core components to drastically improve the interactive experience.
  • Added confirmation modal when dismissing incomplete checklists (fully completed ones dismiss instantly).
  • Fixed checklist launcher sizing issues.
  • Optimized checklist item interactivity and launcher visuals.

ğŸ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where attribute selectors could make the page unclickable.
  • Added try-catch around eval() usage to prevent runtime crashes caused by malformed logic.
  • Fixed flow startup rule behavior when used with checklists and branching flows.
